name: Jazz Mickle's Pro Cap Wearer
description:
JAZZ MICKLE'S PRO CAP WEARER

USE MODERN TECHNOLOGY (ARROW KEYS) TO SELECT FROM HUNDREDS OF COMBINATIONS OF CAP COLORS, PATTERNS AND EVEN WEARABLE POSITIONS

FUTURISTIC 3D TECHNOLOGY ENABLED WITH THE QWERASDF KEYS TO MODIFY TRANSFORMATION PROPERTIES OF THE AVATAR, FOR VIEWING PLEASURE
